message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not quite willing to go that low. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between my original offer and your offer. How about we try $110?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. How about we try $108?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $108. Would you be willing to go down to $102?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try $106?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $104?
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my last offer and your latest offer. How about we try $105.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $105, but no higher. Would you be willing to meet me there?
